title: One-bedroom, one-bathroom condo in Arlington County, Va., lists for $199,900
text:
For example, a condo in River Place is priced at $199,900. Annual property taxes are $1,819, and the monthly condo fee — which covers water, sewer, gas, electricity and access to the community amenities — is $501.

The condo, at 1121 Arlington Blvd. #119, has 716 square feet with one bedroom and one bathroom. In addition to the living room, which has wood parquet flooring, the condo has an updated bathroom, a large bedroom and a balcony. The enclosed kitchen needs updating. The unit also comes with a garage parking space. However, the unit doesn’t have a washer and dryer, but there is a laundry room in the building.

AD

AD

River Place, a gated community built in 1955, sits a few blocks from the Rosslyn Metro station, where developers are adding more high-rise buildings, shops and restaurants. In addition to Metro and bus service, the condo is close to Key Bridge, Routes 50 and 66, Lee Highway and the G.W. Parkway for commuting and airport access.

A convenience store, dry cleaner and barber shop are on the premises of the development, which also has a gym with free classes, an outdoor swimming pool, a hot tub, sauna, steam room, playground and grills.

Assigned schools include Arlington Science Focus School for preschool through fifth grade, Williamsburg Middle and Yorktown High, all rated above average by GreatSchools.org.
